ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Xegony Daily
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve been involved with the XA since earlier days and am a big booster... I ve done a lot of raiding with my new guild - Dragons of Kel dar (long before I was
ygData.messageBody:
I've been involved with the XA since earlier days and am a big booster...
I've done a lot of raiding with my new guild - Dragons of Kel'dar (long
before I was a member) - that was mostly with other guilds (Greys and
Crusaders of the High Plains IIRC)..

Slyde

-----Original Message-----
From: John Grady [mailto:john_grady@...]
Sent: Thursday, April 26, 2001 10:31 PM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: Xegony Daily


This is not just Xegony info., but I'm a Bard there too and also find it
difficult to find raid groups in the 50ish range - especially late PST
when I play duee to family commitments. The small guild I'm in sometimes
teams up with Knights In Arms or Xegony Alliance - where I've run into
both Slyde and Darkfox.

Just curious how everyone feels about XA like inter-guild organizations
and what kind of experience they've had with them?

Tzeetch
